parameter.name: maxResults
parameter.description: The maximum number of multi channel data to include in this response, where the largest acceptable value is 1000.

parameter.name: startDate
parameter.description: Start date for fetching Analytics data. .

parameter.name: ids
parameter.description: The unique table ID of the form ga:XXXX, where XXXX is the Analytics view (profile) ID for which the query will retrieve the data.

parameter.name: endDate
parameter.description: End date for fetching Analytics data. .

parameter.name: metrics
parameter.description: A list of comma-separated metrics, such as mcf:totalConversions,mcf:totalConversionValue.

parameter.name: startIndex
parameter.description: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter.

parameter.name: dimensions
parameter.description: A list of comma-separated dimensions for your Multi-Channel Funnels report, such as mcf:source,mcf:keyword.

parameter.name: sort
parameter.description: A list of comma-separated dimensions and metrics indicating the sorting order and sorting direction for the returned data.

parameter.name: filters
parameter.description: Dimension or metric filters that restrict the data returned for your request.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The fields which the response should show.

parameter.name: callback
parameter.description: Name of the JavaScript callback function that handles the response.

parameter.name: prettyPrint
parameter.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameter.name: userIp
parameter.description: IP address of the end user for whom the API call is being made.
